product_name: BIC Sport Adjustable Stand Up Paddle - Medium Blade
long_description: Perfect for shifting applications from touring to surf, the BIC Sport Adjustable stand up paddle with a medium-sized blade adjusts to cater to the water you're paddling. Medium blade is ideal for all-around padding, racing, low-cadence paddling styles and those looking for a lot of power in the water. Aluminum shaft provides a reliable connection to the water and high value; the BIC Sport Adjustable stand up paddle adjusts from 67 - 83 in. Adjustable length is also ideal for multiple paddlers. Blade shape pulls smoothly through the water. Palm grip fits naturally in your hand, offering you refined control for a variety of paddle strokes.
short_description: Perfect for shifting applications from touring to surf, the BIC Sport Adjustable stand up paddle with a medium-sized blade adjusts to cater to the water you're paddling.
